RelatedSentence: Samsung South Africa has partnered with telecommunications provide Vox Telecom to provide users of Samsung Smart TVs with almost a terabyte of data when they purchase a new television set .

For every user that purchases a television , Vox will give them one - million megabytes for free , which is valid for a year and is unthrottled , unshaped , premium grade ADSL .

africa is South Africa 's newest and most exciting tech blog , covering everything from the top end of government IT investment and spending down to maker culture , hackspaces and - well , generally - fun .
